issue.title: Enable changing the grid snapping parameters when inserting models

content.raw:
It would be nice to be able to toggle grid snapping on/off and using the same button (via drop-down menu) change the grid snapping parameters.
What's kind of confusing right now is that grid snapping is enabled when adding a new object but disabled when moving objects.
content.html: It would be nice to be able to toggle grid snapping on/off and using the same button (via drop-down menu) change the grid snapping parameters. What's kind of confusing right now is that grid snapping is enabled when adding a new object but disabled when moving objects.
